getNamespace(address,address).details: Generates a namespace for a given account and caller

params._caller: The caller address return The generated namespace

params.slot: The storage slot to read from return The namespaced slot

isSlotInitialized(bytes32,bytes32).details: Check if a slot has been initialized

readStorage(bytes32,bytes32).details: Read a value from a specific namespace and slot

params.slot: The storage slot to read from

returns._0: The value stored at the specified namespaced slot

writeStorage(bytes32,bytes32,address).details: Write a value to a specific storage slot

params.slot: The storage slot to write to
